comment.author: 87091938@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Donegal Tír Chonaill places,people and friends., and we'd love to have this added to the group! i wish all the old railway lines were restored.

comment.author: 7945368@N05
comment._content: The railway is long since dismantled.  You can still see where it ran though.  The road is the main road between Donegal town and Ballyboffey.
